thread.title: DeQuata M. Roberson
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by DeQuata M. Roberson

author: DeQuata M. Roberson
title: DeQuata M. Roberson
text:
From the time I made the call for info. I met Frencie, who was very welcoming and friendly. I had plans to go the Taylor store that ending, but didn't get there until 3 days later. She still welcomed me with a friendly smile and professional hand shake. Very knowledgeable of the merchandise.
The delivery guys were very polite and courteous. Their work ethics were very professional.
My experience with GardnerWhite was very professional, friendly and very much worth the while to come back.
